edge: Ludwig Göransson won the Academy Award for Best Original Score for 'Oppenheimer'.
This section is about the soundtrack of the 2023 film 'Oppenheimer' composed by Ludwig Göransson.
Ludwig Göransson composed the score for 'Oppenheimer'.
Ludwig Göransson also composed the score for Christopher Nolan's previous film, 'Tenet'.
